options.content:
# Binance Provider Metrics

Provider-specific components: WebSocket Client, REST Client, REST Fetcher, Orderbook Assembler

## Provider Backpressure Monitoring (Critical)

**Alert**: `provider.events.dropped` should ALWAYS be 0. Any drops indicate downstream processing bottleneck.

panels.description: CRITICAL: Events dropped due to channel backpressure - indicates downstream bottleneck. Should ALWAYS be 0 in healthy system.
panels.title: Provider Events Dropped (ALERT)

panels.description: Events dropped by provider due to backpressure, broken down by event type and symbol
panels.title: Dropped Events by Type & Symbol (Should be 0)

panels.description: WebSocket frame processing rate by status
panels.title: Frame Processing Rate

panels.description: REST API request rate by endpoint
panels.title: REST API Request Rate

panels.description: Orderbook cold start duration (time from first update to snapshot ready)
panels.title: Cold Start Duration

panels.description: Orderbook health status by symbol (based on gap detection)
panels.title: Orderbook Health (by Gap Detection)

panels.description: Distribution of orderbook events by type
panels.title: Event Distribution by Type

panels.description: Orderbook cold start duration by symbol (p50, p95, p99)
panels.title: Cold Start Duration by Symbol (Percentiles)

options.content:
## Recovery Metrics (HTTP Retry with go-retryablehttp)

Automatic retry with exponential backoff: 5 attempts (1 + 4 retries), 100ms-10s backoff, idempotent methods only (GET/HEAD/OPTIONS)

panels.description: Percentage of successful orderbook recoveries after gap detection
panels.title: Recovery Success Rate

panels.description: CRITICAL: Failed recoveries after all retry attempts exhausted - requires immediate investigation
panels.title: Total Recoveries (FAILED)

panels.description: Average number of retries needed for successful recovery
panels.title: Avg Retries Needed

panels.description: Total recovery attempts including all retries
panels.title: Total Attempts (All Retries)

panels.description: Failed recovery attempts by symbol and reason
panels.title: Recovery Failures by Symbol & Reason

panels.description: Time from gap detection to successful snapshot recovery
panels.title: Recovery Duration (Gap → Success)

panels.description: Distribution of retry attempts needed for successful recovery (0=first attempt success, 1-4=retries)
panels.title: Recovery Retry Count Distribution

panels.description: Snapshots applied by source: coldstart (initial) vs immediate (gap recovery)
panels.title: Snapshots Applied by Source

panels.description: Recovery attempts by attempt number (1=first attempt, 2-5=retries)
panels.title: Recovery Attempts by Attempt Number
